item.description: 新型コロナウイルスの感染拡大でマスクの需要が急激に増え、メー

item.title: Ontario's Dundas Peak 'ghost' appears in Reddit user's image
item.description: A hiker has claimed to have seen ‘a thin person with no visible face’ at Dundas Peak in Hamilton, Ontario in a spot he said was ‘completely inaccessible’. ‘Thin person with no face’ appears in image at Ontario’s Dundas Peak ‘Ghost’ appears in walker’s photo: A ‘thin person with no face’ is spotted in image at Ontario’s Dundas Peak – and his friends cannot recreate it **Reddit user visited Dundas Peak in Hamilton, Ontario with a friend ** His friend’s cousin had gone a few days earlier and posted picture to Instagram That picture showed a ghost-like figure lurking in the background But when he tried to recreate the image, he could not see the same figure Published: 12:50 GMT, 8 June 2016 | Updated: 15:09 GMT, 8 June 2016

item.title: People Called A Black Woman–Owned Company “Racist” After A Target Ad. Its Sales Have Doubled, The Owner Said.
item.description: People vowed to stop buying the Honey Pot Company’s products after they claimed it was “racist,” but the company’s sales have since doubled, its owner said. People Called A Black Woman–Owned Company “Racist” After A Target Ad.
